name: glance
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: glance
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to give a quick short look
trans_examp.trans_cn: 瞥一眼，迅速地看一眼，扫视

example.eg: She glanced around/round the room to see who was there.
example.egtrans: 她扫视了一眼房间，看看谁在里面。

example.eg: He glanced up from his book as I passed.
example.egtrans: 我走过的时候，正埋头读书的他抬头瞥了我一眼。

example.eg: Could you glance over/through this letter and see if it's alright?
example.egtrans: 你能不能看一下这封信，看看写得行不行？

dsense.name: glance
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to shine, reflect light, or sparkle

example.eg: The sunlight glanced on the lake.

name: glance
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 瞥一眼，迅速地看一眼，扫视

example.eg: She took/cast a glance at her watch.
He could tell at a glance that something was wrong.
At first glance I thought it was a dog (but I was mistaken).
example.egtrans: 乍一看我还以为是一条狗呢（但是我看走眼了）。
